This is a special version of Java 3D that works with Mac OS X and Java 1.8 and Java 10.

The files were copied from http://show.docjava.com/book/cgij/code/jnlp/libs/jogl/

See also http://forum.jogamp.org/Crash-on-Macos-using-Java-9-td4038267.html

See https://wiki.eecs.berkeley.edu/ptexternal/Main/Java3D
